scripts.test: cd server && yarn run test && cd ../client && yarn run test
scripts.build: cd server && yarn run build && cd ../client && yarn run build && rm ../public/static -rvf && mv build/static ../public/static && mv build/* ../public
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,Node" -c "cyan.bold,green.bold" "cd server && yarn run watch" "yarn run watch-node" "cd client && yarn run watch"
